summary_lines: Due to the ongoing southwest monsoon, the island expects continued high wind conditions. Showers or thunderstorms are predicted for several western regions, with significant rainfall expected in the Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces. Strong winds, potentially reaching 50-60 km/h, may affect various areas, including the Northern, North Central, and Northwestern provinces, as well as the districts of Trincomalee and Hambantota.
